programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Cabin Fever; Return of Power Pig; Fair Exchange
programme.desc: Jon, Garfield and Odie take a winter vacation in a cabin; Garfield and Jon both dream that they switch bodies after arguing about who has the easier life.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Binky Show; Keeping Cool; Don't Move
programme.desc: Garfield goes on a TV game show to win money to buy Jon a birthday present; Odie gets caught by the dog catcher after Garfield tells him not to move.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Magic Mutt; Short Story; Monday Misery
programme.desc: Jon is asked to perform a magic show at a children's hospital; to avoid Monday, Garfield mails himself to Samoa.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Best of Breed; National Tapioca Pudding Day; All About Odie
programme.desc: Garfield enters a cat talent show; Garfield produces a documentary film about Odie.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Caped Avenger; Shy Fly Guy; Green Thumbs Down
programme.desc: Garfield's alter ego searches for missing Pooky; Jon decides he should grow his own food in a garden after seeing their high grocery bills.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Garfield's Forget-Me-Not; I Like Having You Around; Sales Resistance
programme.desc: Garfield suffers amnesia after being hit in the head with a pie tin; Garfield battles a pesky salesman.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Garfield Musical; Mind Over Melvin; Madman Meets His Match
programme.desc: Penelope falls for a cooler cat; Orson gets a mind reading device; the salesman gets some competition.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Third Penelope Episode; Garfield's Garbage Can and Tin Pan Alley Revue
programme.desc: Garfield and Penelope imagine married life; Garfield performs a revue show.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Change of Mind; The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Nermal and Garfield switch personalities; Jon finds his perfect match.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Jonny Ragweedseed; Catch as Cats Can't
programme.desc: Johnny Appleseed spoof; Garfield saves Ludlow from a rival cat.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: A Matter Of Conscience;Grape Expectations, Part 2; Top Ten
programme.desc: A cricket acts as Garfield's conscience; Garfield creates "top ten" lists.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: My Fair Feline; Half-Baked Alaska
programme.desc: A trainer tries to train Garfield; Jon gets a job offer in Alaska.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Puss in High-Tops; Egg Over Easy; Beast From Beyond
programme.desc: Garfield wins the hand of a princess; Wade decides to hide; after coming out of a cave, Sidney the Dinosaur tries to take over the world.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Model Behavior; U.S. Acres: Egg Over Easy: Part 2; Another Ant Episode
programme.desc: Supermodel Heather keeps leading Jon on, while only wanting Garfield for herself; Wade realizes he can't just escape from the world by closing himself off and unshells himself; ants are back and Jon calls Mr. Crater, a bug exterminator.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Guy of her Dreams; The Discount of Monte Cristo; Fairy Dogmother
programme.desc: Penelope expresses her love for Garfield; Aloyisius Pig tries to cut the budget; Odie's wish is fulfilled.
